Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2018 06:21PM leb86 wrote: Hi there! I am going in for a nipple sparing double mastectomy on Monday afternoon. Just found out today! Any tips on what I should prepare for? Or what kind of clothing/accessories I should bring with me to the hospital? Going shopping tomorrow.
Posts.Title: March 2018 Surgery Group mkn86 Kaykat

Posts.Content: leb86 wrote: Hi! I started AC on Wednesday and they put the patch on me. When it went off last night about 15 min into it my heart starting pounding. I felt like was going to get sick. Ran to the bathroom and laid on the floor. Sweating and nausas but never got sick. Still not feeling well I had to use the restroom. When I got up to flush i blacked out for a second. I have a call in to my nurse. Just wondering if this happened to anyone els Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Neulasta patch side effects with AC leb86 Lanne2389
